sense.definition: moving away from so as to no longer be located at or in contact with X2 (e.g., walk off the stage)
abutting and extending away from X2 (e.g., a road off the main boulevard)
in or at a position separated from X2 (e.g., the bird was off its perch)
in or at a position in a body of water separated from X2 (e.g., the boats off the coast)
indicating a substance (often a drug or something that can be viewed as such) being abstained from (e.g., stay off drugs)
indicating an activity (typically work) avoided or not engaged in (e.g., he took time off work)
